text: Kamen Tchanev () (27 August 1964 - 26 November 2020) was a Bulgarian operatic tenor. He was born in Sliven, Bulgaria. He won the Jussi Bj√∂rling International Competition for Tenors in 1994. Tchanev made recordings for the Bulgarian National Radio, RAI-2, Italy and in 1999 he recorded with Plovdiv Philharmonic Orchestra, Nayden Todorov conducting a CD production for the American label MMO. His career began in 1993. Tchanev died on 26 November 2020 in Stara Zagora, Bulgaria from COVID-19, aged 56.Bulgarian international opera star Kamen Chanev dies of Covid-19 ==References== Category:1964 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Bulgarian singers Category:Tenors Category:Stage actors Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Bulgaria
title: Kamen Tchanev
